text:
TiE will be conducting a business plan coaching and competition programme for high school students from STD IX to X11, extending support to selected schools while contributing to the national development efforts of StartUp India.

Interested schools may mail toadmin@tiecoimbatore.orgfor application forms and information on or before February 2 (mobile no.96292-00022).

Elocution contest

Kikani Vidhya Mandir along with Coimbatore Speakers Forum will be organising an English elocution competition for school students.

The competition is also a part of Kovai Vizha of Young Indians. Students from classes VI to IX are eligible to participate. The topic for the contest is ‘Child Safety’. Students can register in the websitewww.keymind.comor call 9677577414 / 9047048468 for further details.
title: Business plan coaching camp
